source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_00<tab>The struggle to prevent the emergence of beasts grows increasingly desperate.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_00<tab>アラミガン・クォーターの偽神獣対策部隊の闘士は、冒険者に伝えたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_01<tab>Raubahn and Arenvald relay to you worrying accounts from throughout Gyr Abania of several people transforming into beasts. Since the recent incident in Ala Gannha, rumors have been spreading that suggest those with familial ties to the Crania Lupi are the ones most likely to turn, which has only served to isolate them further and exacerbate their plight. As the former commander of the imperial unit that she herself annihilated, Fordola has volunteered to investigate the matter, with you assigned to accompany her to Ala Gannha.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_01<tab>フォルドラに同行し、癒し手として獣化対応のフォローをすることになった。ギラバニア山岳地帯のアラガーナで「フォルドラ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_02<tab>Raganfrid explains that the relatives of one of the Crania Lupi have disappeared under suspicious circumstances, with evidence suggesting the presence of beasts. You and Fordola decide to split up and scout the surrounding area for clues as to the missing family's whereabouts.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_02<tab>ラガンフリッドから、連絡が取れなくなった遺族の捜索を依頼された。フォルドラと手分けしてアラガーナ付近を捜索し、終末の獣が現れたら討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_03<tab>You are confronted by a ferocious beast, though it reckoned without your considerable might and is swiftly defeated. Once the dust has settled, you discover a letter that the creature appears to have been carrying.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_03<tab>遺族は獣に転じてしまっていた。アラガーナ付近で、獣が落とした「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E90A001 /var>」を回収しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_04<tab>The letter contains a short message from a member of the Crania Lupi to their mother, who almost certainly transformed into the beast that you vanquished but moments ago. You stow the letter away as evidence and continue your search.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_04<tab>遺族のものと思しき手紙を回収した。アラガーナ付近で残りの遺族を捜索し、獣に転じてしまっていた場合は、討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_05<tab>Once more, you are assailed by a beast, and as before, you are victorious. As the creature dissolves into nothingness, you notice what seems to be a ring, perhaps dropped during the struggle.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_05<tab>遺族はまたしても、獣に転じてしまっていた。アラガーナ付近で、獣が落とした「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E90A101 /var>」を回収しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_06<tab>Upon closer inspection, the ring appears to be a wedding band, complete with an engraving. With this personal effect of the recently deceased in hand, you make your way back to Ala Gannha.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_06<tab>遺族のものと思しき指輪を回収した。これ以上、付近に手がかりはないようだ。アラガーナに戻り、「ラガンフリッド」に遺品を届けよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_07<tab>During her search, Fordola also slew a blasphemy, which bore a ring that matches the one you discovered, all but confirming the fates of the three missing family members. Raganfrid's lamentations are interrupted by a man named Evrat, the brother of one of the Crania Lupi who has benefited from the efforts of the Silver Griffins. His expression soon darkens when he notices Fordola, the person responsible for his bereavement, and he is quickly overwhelmed by a malevolent aura, one with which you are all too familiar. In mere moments, his transformation into a beast is complete, and he moves to strike a young girl standing nearby. Fordola arrives in the nick of time, taking a blow to the shoulder before cutting him down. When she attempts to check on the creature's intended target, the girl's mother demands that she keep away from her child. Fordola turns to leave, but as her injury has yet to be treated, Raganfrid bids you go after her.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_07<tab>ラガンフリッドに報告した。捜索した遺族は獣に転じてしまっていたが、遺品だけでも丁重に弔うつもりだという。そんな折に、アラガーナで手伝いをしていた遺族のひとりが、冒険者たちの目の前で獣に転じてしまった。フォルドラの咄嗟の行動で大惨事は免れたものの、彼女は肩に傷を負ったようだ。アラガーナ付近で、「フォルドラ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_08<tab>Catching up with Fordola, you find her clutching her wounded shoulder. Although she initially refuses your aid, you insist on putting your healing abilities to use.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_08<tab>フォルドラと話した。アラガーナ付近で、負傷している「フォルドラ」を癒そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_09<tab>After treating Fordola's injury, she begins to speak openly about her personal struggles. Her feelings of regret and remorse come boiling to the surface, manifesting as a dark mist. For a moment, you fear she may transform into a beast in the same way as Evrat, but a few well-chosen words soon help her to regain control. She then asks that you wait with her while she recovers from her ordeal, during which time the normally taciturn soldier discusses her past.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_09<tab>フォルドラを癒した。彼女は、髑髏連隊時代に自分が犯した罪を思いだし、自分を責めていた。絶望に呑まれ、獣化しそうになったフォルドラを落ち着かせ、話を聞いた。アラミガン・クォーターに戻り、「ラウバーン」に報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_10<tab>Returning to the Ala Mhigan Quarter, you report to Raubahn, who offers his thanks for your part in the investigation and for minimizing casualties. He goes on to explain that in order to escape the animosity they faced in Gyr Abania, several surviving relatives of the Skulls have relocated to Ul'dah. Fearing for their safety, Raubahn plans to discuss the matter with Nanamo, and he invites you to join him.

※The next role quest will be available from the blasphemy hunter upon reaching level 87 in any healer class.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SEQ_10<tab>ラウバーンと話した。遺族たちの中には、ザナラーンに移住している者もいるようだ。ウルダハとの連携を強化するため、ナナモ女王への謁見を申請しているという。報告が上がる頃に、また訪ねてこよう。

※いずれかのHEALERジョブのレベルが87以上になると、アラミガン・クォーターの偽神獣対策部隊の闘士から次のHEALERロールクエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Fordola in Ala Gannha.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_00<tab>アラガーナのフォルドラと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_01<tab>Survey the designated location and defeat any enemies that appear.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB27F01 /var>で見渡し、終末の獣が現れたら討伐

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_02<tab>Inspect the dropped letter.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB28001 /var>を調べる

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_03<tab>Survey the designated location and defeat any enemies that appear.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_03<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB28101 /var>で見渡し、終末の獣が現れたら討伐

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_04<tab>Inspect the dropped ring.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_04<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB28201 /var>を調べる

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the possessions of the dead to Raganfrid.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_05<tab>ラガンフリッドに遺品を渡す

target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_06<tab>フォルドラと話す

target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_07<tab>フォルドラを癒す

target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_TODO_08<tab>アラミガン・クォーターのラウバーンと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_LIVERATIONARMY_000_000<tab>We were hoping you'd stop by. I'll show you to Commander Aldynn at once.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_LIVERATIONARMY_000_000<tab>あっ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
ラウバーン隊長がお呼びですよ、こちらへどうぞ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_001<tab>You're a welcome sight as always, <var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_001<tab>呼びつけてすまぬな。
引き続き、偽神獣の件で協力してもらいたい。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_002<tab>Aye, and a lot's happened since last we spoke. We Silver Griffins've been keeping busy.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_002<tab>また会えたな、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
俺も今、「白羽根の会」の活動報告をしていたところさ。
動かないと身体がなまっちまうからな。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_003<tab>As have I and my men, but I'm afraid we've little to show for our efforts. Although we've been searching high and low for the blasphemy, we've seen neither hide nor hair of it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_003<tab>まずは吾輩から偽神獣に関する報告をさせてくれ。
結論から言うと、未だ発見には至っていない。
どういうわけか、一件の目撃情報もなく、手掛かりが皆無の状態だ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_004<tab>Unfortunately, everyone else has had “better” luck. We've received reports of lesser beasts throughout Gyr Abania, and putting them down is as important as hunting the blasphemy that got away.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_004<tab>再び姿を現し、被害が出る前に討伐したいところだが……
ギラバニア各地で獣化が相次いで報告されていてな。
解放軍はそちらの対応を優先せざるを得なくなっている。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_005<tab>To complicate matters, rumors have been circulating that these beasts were the Skulls' kin. While this was true of the recent incident in Ala Gannha, we cannot have people jumping to conclusions, given what they might feel tempted to do.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_005<tab>……そして残念なことに、獣化した者たちが、
髑髏連隊の関係者だったという噂が広まりつつある。
それが遺族らの自責の念を煽り、獣化を誘発しているようなのだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_006<tab>It has been suggested that we take these individuals into custody─for their own protection as much as the safety of others─but that would only isolate them even further and give credence to the rumors.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_006<tab>遺族たちを集めて保護すべきという意見も出たんだが、
それこそ、差別を助長してしまいかねないだろ？
何が最善なのか、難しいところだよ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_007<tab>The recent unrest has hindered the efforts of the Silver Griffins to no end. Therefore, I ask that you aid them in their endeavors, and see if there is aught that can be done.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_007<tab>「白羽根の会」の面々も、遺族たちの支援に回ってくれているが、
それでも獣化が疑われるような事例が、数件出てしまっている。
ゆえに、吾輩と手分けして対処にあたってもらいたい。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_008<tab>Also...you'll be joined by another volunteer. Try not to be too surprised.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_008<tab>この件に関しては、新たに協力を志願してくれた人物がいてね。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>もよく知っている奴だぜ？
まあ、なんだ……少し愛想は悪いが……

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_009<tab>(-???-)I thought I felt my ears burning...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_009<tab>(-？？？？-)何か言ったか？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_010<tab>I said I don't need a keeper, but did they bloody listen? Did they bollocks.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_010<tab>……お前と組むようにとの指示だ。
ひとりで十分だと言ったが、監視が必要らしい。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_011<tab>Come on, don't be like that. This is what you agreed to. Besides, you never know when you might have need of a healer, and there's none better than <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_011<tab>そう卑屈になるなよ、フォルドラ。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>に同行してもらうのは、
癒し手として、フォローしてもらうためなんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_012<tab>He's right. You've earned a measure of trust, and this shouldn't be taken to mean otherwise.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_012<tab>ああ、その通りだ。
お前のことを信用していないわけではない。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_013<tab>Thick as thieves are we now? Then there's no need for this sodding collar, aye? Hmph. We all know it's not coming off any time soon. But if this is how it's to be, then fine─so long as <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> keeps out of my way.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_013<tab>だったら、この囚人用の首輪を外してもらいたいところだが。
……まあいい、そいつなら足手まといにはならないだろうからな。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_014<tab>I want the two of you to visit the Silver Griffins headquarters in Ala Gannha. Several relatives of the Crania Lupi have agreed to meet with them, and we could do with a measure of precaution.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_014<tab>ふたりには協力要請があったアラガーナへ向かってもらいたい。
あの辺りは「白羽根の会」の本拠地があることもあって、
支援対象となる遺族も集まっているのだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_015<tab>If anyone so much as mentions the Skulls, I'll deal with it. Understood?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_015<tab>……髑髏連隊に関わることなら、
なにがあろうと、私がこの手で始末をつける。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_100_015<tab>Let's get this over with.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_100_015<tab>……行くぞ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_016<tab>She's as much at risk of turning as anyone─maybe even more so. You don't need the Echo to see the weight she's carrying.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_016<tab>……フォルドラのこと、どうか頼んだよ。
今回の一件で、最も自責の念を感じているのは、
髑髏連隊の隊長であった彼女のはずなんだ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_017<tab>She's still not got a handle on her own Echo, either. Sometimes the visions come without warning and with such force that it's all she can do to stay standing. There's no telling what might happen when she comes face-to-face with the family of her former comrades...so look out for her. Please.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_017<tab>そのうえ、フォルドラは超越者としての強化の副作用で、
頻繁に過去視が発生する体質になっている。
彼女自身が望んだ任務とはいえ、心配なんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_018<tab>I wish there was more I could do for her myself...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_018<tab>本当だったら俺だって……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_019<tab>...But we've all got our own duties, and I'll see them through to the end.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_019<tab>……いや、すまない。
俺は俺にしかできないことを探すって、決めたんだ。
必ず、前に進んでみせるさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_020<tab>So must we all. Follow Fordola's lead─we're counting on you both─but be ready to step in, even if she curses you for it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_020<tab>「アラガーナ」でフォルドラと落ち合ってくれ。
頼むぞ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_021<tab>Fordola's not the sort to ask for help, so make sure she doesn't get in over her head, would you?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_ARENVALD_000_021<tab>フォルドラのこと、よろしく頼む。
俺は俺で、できることを探すからさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_030<tab>I'll admit, this is not quite what I had in mind...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_030<tab>……め、珍しい組み合わせだな。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_031<tab>...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_031<tab>……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_032<tab>I had a feeling Raubahn would send you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but as for <var 1A 02 /var>her<var 1A 01 /var>...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_032<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>に、フォルドラ……？
め、珍しい組み合わせだな。
解放軍に協力を要請したものの、まさかお前たちが来るとは……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_033<tab>If you've got any complaints, take it up with the commander.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_033<tab>……獣はどこにいる？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_034<tab>No...no, it's fine. Truth be told, ever since that day at the Royal Palace, I've been thinking...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_034<tab>ああ、もちろん伝えるが、その前にフォルドラ……。
代表者会議以来だったかな。
ええと……あのときは……お前のおかげで……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_035<tab>Stop. You don't want to say it, and I don't want to hear it.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_035<tab>……終わったことはもういい。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_036<tab>To the matter at hand, then... We Silver Griffins have been working to support the relatives of the Crania Lupi, but one family has gone missing. A mother and her parents, who lived together under the same roof.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_036<tab>そ、そうか……では本題に入ろう。
実は、この近辺で活動していた「白羽根の会」の同志から、
髑髏連隊の遺族ら数名と連絡が取れなくなったと、報告があった。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_037<tab>One of ours paid them a visit, but they were nowhere to be seen, and when they went inside to check, they found the house had been torn to shreds. Thick gouges in the floor and the walls─made by a beast's claws, by the look of them.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_037<tab>件の遺族は、祖父、祖母、母の3人暮らしのはずだが、
巡回担当が自宅を訪ねたところ、ひとりの姿もなかった。
室内は荒れ果て、鋭い爪で引っ掻かれたような傷があったそうだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_038<tab>You think they've turned.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_038<tab>……獣に堕ちた可能性があるということか。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_039<tab>Aye, that's the most likely explanation. Please, do what you must before anyone else is hurt.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_039<tab>名前を伝えておくので、3人を捜索してもらいたい。
万が一、獣化しているようだったら……
人を襲ってしまう前に……どうか楽にしてやってほしい。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_040<tab>There's no time to waste. I'll head west, you east.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_040<tab>手分けして探す方が早いだろう。
私は西側を……お前は東側の捜索を頼む。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_041<tab>...Arenvald tells me she's been trying to make amends in her own way.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_041<tab>フォルドラの過去の行いを水に流すことなどできないが、
彼女だけが悪いのではないと、今は考えを改めたのでな……。
その後の彼女の活躍も、アレンヴァルドからきいている。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_042<tab>I appreciate that she's not asking for what I can't give, but...I keep thinking to myself, “Where do we go from here?” And I honestly don't know...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_042<tab>しかし……いざ彼女を前にすると、
どう接していいものやら、迷いが生じてしまうな。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>In the dirt you spy an envelope containing a crumpled, tearstained letter.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>開封済みの手紙だ。
何度も読まれたものなのか、端がボロボロになっている。
宛名は依頼された捜索対象者のものだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Read the letter?
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>中身を読みますか？

source:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>(-Crumpled Letter-)Dear Mother,
I hope this letter finds you well. Time is short, so I must keep this brief. Although I have never done anything to make you proud, I promise you things will be different when the war is over. Until then, take care and know that I love you with all my heart.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>(-遺族宛の手紙-)お母さん、今までなにも親孝行できなくてごめんなさい。
自由を勝ち取ったら、必ず迎えにいきます。
それまでどうか身体に気を付けて、元気でいてください。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>Placing the letter back into its envelope, you turn your attention to finding the others...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>……残りの遺族を探そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>You discover what appears to be a wedding ring, with a name and date engraved on the inside.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>指輪が落ちている。
名前らしき文字と日付が刻まれている。
結婚指輪だろうか……捜索対象者のひとりと名前が一致した。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>With seemingly no more clues to be found, you decide to report to Raganfrid.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>この辺りには、もう手がかりはないようだ。
ラガンフリッドに報告しよう……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_070<tab>...What's done is done.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_070<tab>……その様子では、すでに獣化していたようだな。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_071<tab>Were you able to find anything?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_071<tab>捜索ご苦労だった。
そちらも、遺族は見つかっただろうか？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_072<tab>...Then it is as we feared.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_072<tab>そうか……手遅れだったか……。
またしても力が及ばなかった。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_073<tab>I found and killed a third. It was carrying this.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_073<tab>こちらも別の獣を始末した。
……それから、この指輪は遺品だろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_074<tab>A matching ring... I'll deliver these effects to their next of kin and arrange for a funeral─or as close to one as possible under the circumstances.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_074<tab>ふたりともありがとう。
この遺品だけでも、丁重に弔ってやらねばな。
彼らがこのアラミゴで、立派に生きた証だ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_075<tab>...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_075<tab>……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_076<tab>There's no changing the past. We'll always carry it, and the scars. But no matter who we were or what we did, we're Ala Mhigans. Then and now.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_076<tab>お前の目には偽善行為に見えるかもしれぬが、
帝国に勝った今、我らはみな故郷を同じとするアラミゴ人だ。
こんな悲しい最期があってはならないだろう……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_077<tab>The Empire was our enemy then, and now it's despair. Good words and deeds will serve us best in this fight─weapons even an old man like me can yet wield...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_077<tab>ひとりでも多くの同胞を救いたい。
今は地道に、絶望せぬよう対話を続けるしかないのだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_100<tab>Thanks to the two of you, the missing villagers may finally be laid to rest. I and the other Silver Griffins will redouble our efforts to prevent any further tragedies.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_100<tab>とにもかくにも、遺族たちの行方はわかったわけだ。
ふたりとも、今回は嫌な役回りをさせてしまい、すまなかったな。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_EVRAT_100_100<tab>(-???-)I've finished checking the wares, sir! Everything's in order!
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_EVRAT_100_100<tab>(-？？？？-)ラガンフリッドさん、検品終わりましたよ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_101<tab>Good work. Take a rest, lad. You've more than earned it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_101<tab>ああ、エヴラット君……！
ご苦労だったね、疲れただろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_100_102<tab>Keep this to yourselves, but Evrat's younger brother was a member of the Crania Lupi. He's exactly the sort of person we're trying to help.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_100_102<tab>紹介しよう。
彼もまた「白羽根の会」の支援対象者で、
髑髏連隊の遺族のひとりだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_102<tab>Like many of the others, he was reluctant to talk to us at first. But after we'd gained his trust, we were able to help him find work. He's taken to it well.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_102<tab>当初は、支援を拒んでいたのだが、
辛抱強く接するうちに、心をひらいてくれるようになったのだ。
今は我々の仲介によって、ここで仕事に就いたところでな……

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_EVRAT_000_103<tab>It's her! The Butcher!
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_EVRAT_000_103<tab>おっ、お前は……髑髏の処刑人！！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_EVRAT_000_104<tab>Traitors, all of us... Kinslayers deserving of hate and death... Hate and death...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_EVRAT_000_104<tab>そうか……そうだった……許されていいはずがないんだ……。
俺は、やっぱり、薄汚い裏切り者なんだ……。
身内から同胞殺しを出した、売国奴……売国奴……売国奴ォォ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_105<tab>Get back! Get back!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_105<tab>皆そいつから離れろ！
獣化するぞ！！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_CLARELL_000_106<tab>Stay away from her!
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_CLARELL_000_106<tab>私の子どもに近付かないで！！！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_107<tab>Fordola saved your girl's life!
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_107<tab>彼女は子どもの命を守ったのだぞ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_CLARELL_000_108<tab>I-I know, but...she's...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_CLARELL_000_108<tab>ご、ごめんなさい……。
つい……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_109<tab>It happened in an instant. That poor lad...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_109<tab>なんて……なんてことだ……。
ようやく心を開いてくれた、エヴラット君が…………。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_100_109<tab>But it had to be done, and without hesitation. Would've been much worse otherwise...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_100_109<tab>いや、私が迂闊だったのだ……。
遺族たちが負った心の傷は、想像よりもずっと深い……。
それなのに……すまない、本当にすまない……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_110<tab>Could you go after Fordola and see to her wounds? I'll do what I can here.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_110<tab>とはいえ、今は生き残った者のことも考えなければ……。
すまんが、フォルドラの傷を手当てしてやってくれぬか？
私はここの者たちに、事情を説明しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_CLARELL_000_111<tab>She risked her life to save my daughter... Whatever else she may have done, I owe her for that.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_CLARELL_000_111<tab>気が動転してしまって……。
娘の命の恩人だというのに、私は酷いことを……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_LYLIE_000_112<tab>I want to say thank you to the brave lady for rescuing me... Do you think I'll see her again?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_LYLIE_000_112<tab>すごくこわかったけど、あのお姉ちゃんが助けてくれたの。
きちんとお礼が言いたかったのに……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_113<tab>We're not living a song or a faerie tale. These problems we struggle with won't be solved overnight. Nevertheless, we've got to do what we can to move forward as a people united, or we'll have to keep dealing with tragedies like this.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAGANFRID_000_113<tab>……あの母親の態度とて、責められまいよ。
根底にあるのは、相手をよく知らぬがゆえの恐怖なのだ……。
それにしても、ああ……エヴラット君……本当にすまない……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_120<tab>I'm fine. Leave me be.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_120<tab>……大した傷じゃない、大丈夫だ。
お前は先に戻っていろ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_121<tab>I said I don't need your help!
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_121<tab>……放っておいてくれッ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_Q2_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_A2_000_001<tab>It's not only your injuries I'm worried about.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_A2_000_001<tab>フォルドラが心配だ

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_A2_000_002<tab>I'm a healer. Let me do my job.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_A2_000_002<tab>癒し手として放っておけない

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_122<tab>Bloody hells... If you're here to patch me up, get on with it. <var 1A 02 /var>Quietly<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_122<tab>チッ……。
どいつもこいつもお節介だな……好きにしろ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_123<tab>Gods, you're like a dog with a bone. Go on then, and make it quick.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_123<tab>チッ……。
存外強引だな……わかったから、早くしてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_130<tab>...A coeurl can't change its spots. And there's no washing the blood off my hands. Nor would I, even if I could.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_130<tab>……あの母親の態度を見ただろう？
表面上は取り繕ったって、結局腹の底は皆同じさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_131<tab>Taking up Garlean steel was the first choice, but not the last. Like the first kill─the hardest. Every “choice” after that came easier and easier...until I stopped counting. Stopped caring.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_131<tab>なぜ、そんな顔をする？
私はお前のような英雄が救うに値しない、ただの罪人だ。
多くの命を奪い、仲間まで手にかけた……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_132<tab>You tell yourself it's right. It's for the greater good. You give the order, feel the ground tremble as the cannon fires, and when the dust settles...and your own men are buried beneath the rubble...and you tell yourself...you tell yourself...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_132<tab>共に育ち、共に苦しみ、共に自由を夢見てきた仲間を、
私はッ、殺したんだ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_133<tab>Heh... Me too...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_133<tab>これは……さっきの男と同じ靄……！？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_134<tab>Aaah...AAAAAAGH!
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_134<tab>クソ……クソッ！！！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_Q3_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_A3_000_001<tab>You mustn't give in!
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_A3_000_001<tab>気をしっかり持て

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_A3_000_002<tab>I won't let it take you!
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_A3_000_002<tab>大丈夫、自分がそばにいる

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_135<tab>Haaah... Haaah...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_135<tab>ハァ……ハァッ…………。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_136<tab>That man in the village... I saw his past. I'm the one who killed his brother!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_136<tab>視たんだ……あの男の過去を……。
私が、死なせた……あいつの家族を……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_137<tab>I...I'll be all right. I just need a moment. Can you...wait with me?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_137<tab>すまない……落ち着く時間をくれ。
それまで、少しでいい……近くにいてほしい……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_138<tab>Everything the Skulls fought for─the sacrifices we made, the things we did... In the end, it was all for nothing.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_138<tab>……私は髑髏連隊で戦ったことを後悔などしていない。
後悔は、同胞の自由につながると信じて戦い、
死んでいった仲間たちを侮辱するに等しい。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_139<tab>Sometimes I look back on the road I walked, and the bitterness I can still taste, and I wonder. If I'd grown up in another time, another place...would I have done the same to a different people? Was it always in me...to be me?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_139<tab>だが、ときどき自分の運命を呪うことがある。
生まれた土地、時代、境遇がほんの少し違っただけで、
死ななくて済んだ命が、無数にあっただろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_140<tab>All I know is...everyone would've been better off if I'd never been born.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_140<tab>私たちは皆平等に、同じ命だというのにな。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_141<tab>But I was. And I dragged others into a hell of my own making. I remember these two brothers in particular─childhood friends of mine. The older one enlisted with me, but the younger...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_141<tab>もちろん私にだって、
違う道を歩めた可能性はあっただろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_100_141<tab>He would never have made it as a soldier. He was too kind. Too...<var 1A 02 /var>good<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_100_141<tab>……私の幼馴染に、ある兄弟がいてな。
直情型の兄は、私と共に帝国軍に入り、
心根の優しい弟は、戦いを嫌って志願を取りやめたんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_142<tab>Ansfrid died at Specula Imperatoris, but his brother's still out there somewhere─not that I've got the courage to face him after what I did. I hope he's found the life he deserves...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_142<tab>結果、兄の方は……私が命じた砲撃で死んだ。
弟の方は今も生きているはずだが、とても顔向けはできない。
私と違う道で、せめて自由を得ていてくれたならと、願っている。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_Q4_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_A4_000_001<tab>I met a former Skull called Hrudolf.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_A4_000_001<tab>フルドルフという名の青年に出会った

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_A4_000_002<tab>I know a young man who survived the fall of Specula Imperatoris.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_A4_000_002<tab>砲撃から奇跡的に生還した青年を知っている

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_100_142<tab>Hrudolf!? He's alive!? But how?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_100_142<tab>フルドルフが……！？
そうか、あいつは生きていたのか……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_110_142<tab>Who!? Did you get his name?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_110_142<tab>まさか……！
詳しく話を聞かせてくれ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_120_142<tab>Not all of the Crania Lupi at the towers died that day, though. I know from one of my visions that at least one survived. Hrudolf.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_120_142<tab>実は他にも、生還した昔馴染みがいるんだ。
名をフルドルフと言ってな……。
偶然にも、生還した事実を過去視で知ることになった。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_143<tab>I'm glad he made it out...but too many others didn't. Too many others still need our help. I helped make this blasphemy, and by Rhalgr, I'll kill the bastard if it's the last thing I do.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_143<tab>……必死に生き延びた仲間たちがいる。
偽神獣に髑髏連隊が関わっている可能性があるのなら、
最後は私が……この手でカタをつけたいんだ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_144<tab>...Anyway, that's enough out of me.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_144<tab>チッ……今日の私は喋りすぎだな。
さっきは迷惑をかけた、もう大丈夫だ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_145<tab>I'll be heading back to the city to make my report. I suggest you do likewise.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_FORDOLA_000_145<tab>私はアラミガン・クォーターに戻る。
「ラウバーン」隊長へは、お前からも報告を頼む。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_150<tab>Welcome back. Fordola's already given her account, and I'd like to hear yours, too.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_150<tab>戻ったか、礼を言う。
フォルドラから簡単な報告は受けてはいるが、
貴様から見た今回の一件を聞かせてくれぬだろうか。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_151<tab>So she almost turned into a beast herself...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_151<tab>そうか……。
フォルドラが危うく獣化を……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_152<tab>Hm. We'll have to take that into consideration before sending her into the field again.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_152<tab>任務続行が可能かどうかは、慎重に検討しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_153<tab>As far as the events in Ala Gannha are concerned, the two of you did well. Despite the appearance of several beasts, you were able to prevent any further casualties. However, this serves to confirm that those with connections to the Crania Lupi should be considered at risk of turning.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_153<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>たちの活躍のおかげもあり、
獣の被害は最小限に食い止められている。
だが、依然として髑髏連隊の遺族を中心に獣化は続いている状況だ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_154<tab>Over the years, many of them have drifted away from the larger settlements and have taken to living in secret. Others made their way to Ul'dah as refugees, including some individuals of interest.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_154<tab>「白羽根の会」の報告では、遺族たちは集落を避け、
辺境の地で身を隠して生活している者もいるらしい。
中には、ザナラーンに移住した者さえいるのだとか……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_155<tab>As such, we'll be working closely with the Immortal Flames to locate and offer support to those refugees in particular.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_155<tab>解放軍はウルダハの不滅隊と共同戦線を張っているが、
さらに連携を強化し、対策を講じる必要があるだろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_156<tab>In fact, I plan to make the journey there for an audience with the sultana. Once my preparations are complete, perhaps you might accompany me? I'm sure she'll be glad to see you.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_RAUBAHN_000_156<tab>そういうわけで、ナナモ女王陛下への謁見を申請しようと思う。
謁見の際には、貴様も共に来てくれると助かる。
許可が下りるまでは、しばし待っていてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_LIVERATIONARMY_000_157<tab>I heard about what happened. If nothing else, at least you've seen with your own eyes what we're up against.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA211_04109_LIVERATIONARMY_000_157<tab>おかえりなさいませ！
お怪我はありませんでしたか？
